import { Icon } from '@iconify/react'; import FollowBtn from "./FollowBtn" function DevItem({ dev }) { return (
{dev.rank}

{dev.name}

{dev.username}

{ dev.popularRepository.repositoryName && (
Popular repo

 {dev.popularRepository.repositoryName}

{dev.popularRepository.description}
) }
) } export default DevItem
